title: Bug 120315: Display property 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', the item should not be visible in the PDF.
EB: After setting the display property of an item to 'none', the item is still visible in the PDF.
SR: Investigate the issue, identify why the display property 'none' is not working in the new PDF emitter, and fix the problem so that the item is correctly hidden in the generated PDF.
